Name: FATED: The Silent Oath
About the game: Set in the mythical age of Vikings, FATED: The Silent Oath tells a tale of courage and sacrifice where an everyday father and husband must do the impossible to save his family from the destruction of the world at the hands of giants of old. FATED is a first-person movie-length narrative-adventure game in virtual reality. This immersive game with stunning visuals showcases the best that VR has to offer, proposing a strong story-driven, narrative experience that focuses on emotion over gameplay. Key Features: • First-person virtual reality action-adventure game • Highly polished visuals • Fully immersive and emotional journey • Enchanting and captivating musical atmosphere • Strong story-driven, narrative experience
